- [x] Create mobile app (React Native)

## Completed Setup

The RetroByte gamified environmental learning platform has been fully scaffolded with:

### Backend (Node.js/Express)
- Express server with CORS support
- MongoDB models for users, quizzes, missions, eco-actions, and badges
- JWT authentication with middleware
- RESTful API routes for all features
- Environment configuration

### Frontend (React)
- Authentication system (login/register)
- Dashboard with user stats and achievements
- Quiz component with filtering
- Mission browser with acceptance
- Eco-action logging with geolocation
- Leaderboard with category filtering
- Responsive CSS styling

### Mobile (React Native)
- React Native app with Expo
- Bottom tab navigation
- Authentication screens
- Dashboard, quizzes, missions, log action screens
- GPS and camera integration support
- API client for backend communication

### Features Implemented
✅ Quizzes & puzzles (6 categories, 3 difficulty levels)
✅ Missions & challenges (5 eco-action types)
✅ Rewards system (coins, XP, badges)
✅ Leaderboards (global + categories)
✅ Real-world eco-action logging
✅ User profiles & achievements
✅ Authentication & authorization
✅ Responsive web design
✅ Mobile-first app design

## Next Steps

1. Start the MongoDB instance
2. Run `npm install` in backend, frontend, and mobile folders
3. Configure `.env` files
4. Start each service:
   - Backend: `npm start` (port 5000)
   - Frontend: `npm start` (port 3000)
   - Mobile: `npm start` (Expo)
